wellerman.name: Wellerman
wellerman.description: A pirate classic, nothing makes you feel the ocean breeze in your hair like a whaling shanty

jolirouge.name: Joli Rouge
jolirouge.description: Something a bit more upbeat, slam your flagon's and chug 'til ye drop.

hoisthecolours.name: Hoist the Colours
hoisthecolours.description: Reaffirm your loyalty to the pirate way and feel this deep, bellowing rendition inspire you to take up arms.
